title: Halep and Sharapova Drawn Together at WTA Finals
text:
Published By: NYTimes Tennis - Today 
Top seed Simona Halep was pooled with grand slam winners Maria Sharapova and Flavia Pennetta in a formidable looking Red Group for the end-o...
